[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/localization-plugin](./localization-plugin.md) &gt; [ILocalizationPluginOptions](./localization-plugin.ilocalizationpluginoptions.md) &gt; [globsToIgnore](./localization-plugin.ilocalizationpluginoptions.globstoignore.md)

## ILocalizationPluginOptions.globsToIgnore property

This option is used to specify `.resx` , `.resx.json` and `.loc.json` files that should not be processed by this plugin.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
globsToIgnore?: string[];
```
